item.title: Get notified via IFTTT or Pushbullet when OpenWRT router has started
item.description: Using IFTTT’s Maker channel, I could setup a Web Request receiver or if you prefer a simpler method, you could use Pushbullet. Then I configured my OpenWRT router to post to the receiver on startup.
